name: Doodh Cola
description: Doodh Cola / Milk Cola is a very unique Cooler from Kolkata. I can asure you that you had never heard about it before, but believe me it so yummy.Doodh Cola is one of the most favored of recent trending meals on earth. It is simple, it is quick, it tastes delicious
directions: Take a large glass and add milk and ice cube.
Then add chilled Cola and again shake another few times.
